alert.note: Alert for Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 4:46PM CDT until May 06 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HOLT AND CENTRAL NODAWAY COUNTIES... At 445 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Skidmore, or near Maryville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Spotter reported quarter sized hail in Skidmore. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Maryville, Skidmore, Pickering and Arkoe. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northwestern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
